Change history
==============

0.2 (2008-04-27)
----------------

- Added support for automatically finding multiple instances.
  [hannosch]

- Better use the recipe name for finding the instance, as this is less likely
  to conflict.
  [hannosch]

0.1 (2008-04-27)
----------------

- Whitespace fixes.
  [hannosch]

- Created recipe with ZopeSkel.
  [mustapha]
